channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT adoption skyrockets in India, but monetization may be trailing
item.description: ChatGPT has seen India as its largest market by monthly active users and the second largest by downloads, per the external data seen by TechCrunch.

item.title: How Kalshi helped prediction markets go mainstream
item.description: Kalshi is the largest prediction market in America, creating an entire trading economy around political, sports, and cultural events. To some, includi...

item.title: President Trump’s War on ‘Information Silos’ Is Bad News for Your Personal Data
item.description: Donald Trump’s March 20 executive order aims to eliminate data silos. It could undermine privacy in the process.

item.title: OpenAI’s models ‘memorized’ copyrighted content, new study suggests
item.description: A new study appears to lend credence to allegations that OpenAI trained at least some of its AI models on copyrighted content. OpenAI is embroiled in ...

item.title: 12 Best Turntables (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Streaming music giving you the blues? These record players will help you rock on to analog audio at home.

item.title: SpaceX Took a Big Step Toward Reusing Starship’s Super Heavy Booster
item.description: A successful reflight of SpaceX's Super Heavy booster would be an important milestone for its Starship program.

item.title: Inside DOGE’s AI Push at the Department of Veterans Affairs
item.description: A DOGE operative at the Department of Veterans Affairs appears to be trying to use an AI tool to write code for the agency’s systems, among other prop...

item.title: AI has opened a new era in venture capital according to Forerunner founder Kirsten Green
item.description: Forerunner has seen a number of high-profile successes, showing an ability to get ahead of consumer trends with investments in Oura, Chime, the Farmer...

item.title: Nintendo Delays Switch 2 Preorders Thanks to Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: In an unprecedented move, Nintendo has pushed preorders for its highly anticipated Switch 2 to an unknown date. Why? Trump’s tariffs.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Tesla takes a hit, tariff chaos begins, and one EV startup hits a milestone
